2-seater.Name: Hablo Chesterfield 2 Seater Sofa Fabric Silver
2-seater.Body:
Casual, contemporary design meets luxury style with the Hablo 2 Seater Silver Sofa from the Chesterfield collection. This UK-made piece is perfect for lounging solo or with the company thanks to its wide, deep seating supported by heavy gauge sinuous springs. A durable hardwood frame shapes its low-profile round arm silhouette, with every inch hand-tailored in lush velvet. The tufted seat and fixed back cushions add an extra flair to the Hablo 2 Seater Silver Sofa and supply irresistible softness.

beds.Name: Turan Media TV Bed Frame with Headboard Fabric Grey
beds.Body:
The Turan TV Bed is a beautifully simple shaker design with two recessed panels that add depth and create a nuanced style that you will love for years to come. It has a single top that hinges open as your TV extends forward on either one of the TV lift mechanisms. Add one of our mattresses to your Turan TV Bed for good, quality sleep and to give the best rest to your body overnight.


BED FEATURES:

  • Made from high-quality timber
  • Comes with headboard
  • 8 built-in adjustable speakers
  • 8 directional speakers at the foot end
  • Can accommodate a TV up to 43"
  • 4.1 channel system for better sound quality
  • Bluetooth compatible
  • Side storage for DVD/media boxes
  • Steel center rail support system   
  • Sprung slats for better support            
  • 3 years warranty against faulty manufacture
  • Assembly Required 
  • UK manufactured

beds.Name: Somni Pocket Gel Hybrid Mattress + Divan Bed with Headboard - more color options
beds.Body:
We present Our Divan bed with Somni Mattress inspired by the classic style of vintage furniture from a London apartment, with a frame and a chic headboard. Chenille upholstered panels of the storage bed. Two drawers on each side offer convenient storage for linens and essentials.
Somni Cool Gel Memory 2500 Pocket Sprung Mattress is a gel-infused memory foam technology. That helps give this mattress a truly cooling feel. The 5cm gel-memory layer helps dissipate excess body heat. The Divan bed with Somni - the result is you fall asleep faster! Nestled underneath the cooling gel memory, you will find thousands of individual pocket springs, working to provide the support you need. Pocket springs give the ultimate care and support for your back and overall posture. There's no transfer of movement between you and your partner either. The Somni is a medium-feel mattress - which means it's not too soft or too firm. 
Somni-encapsulated technology helps reinforce the mattress border. That means you'll get a sturdier mattress edge and plenty of space to spread out in bed - with no worries about rolling off! All you will need to do to keep it in good condition is rotate it once a month.


BED KEY FEATURES:

  • Divan Bed with Somni Pocket Gel Hybrid Mattress
  • Matching Headboard
  • Chenille Fabric 
  • Color option
  • Drawers Option
  • Handcrafted in the UK
  • Assembly Required
MATTRESS SPECIFICATIONS:
  • High-density foam base
  • Gel transition foam and memory foam
  • Pocket Spring System
  • The stretch-knit fabric cover
  • Tape-edge finish
  • The cover is not removable
  • Medium-firm comfort
  • Somni encapsulated technology
  • The sculpted AirFlow layer maintains coolness
  • 10 inches thick roll packed
  • Available in 5 sizes
  • UK Fire Retardant 
  • Spot clean only
  • 3-year Limited Manufacturer warranty

We present Our Divan bed with Somni Mattress inspired by the classic style of vintage furniture from a London apartment, with a frame and a chic headboard. Chenille upholstered panels of the storage bed. Two drawers on each side offer convenient storage for linens and essentials.
Somni Cool Gel Memory 2500 Pocket Sprung Mattress is a gel-infused memory foam technology. That helps give this mattress a truly cooling feel. The 5cm gel-memory layer helps dissipate excess body heat. The Divan bed with Somni - the result is you fall asleep faster! Nestled underneath the cooling gel memory, you will find thousands of individual pocket springs, working to provide the support you need. Pocket springs give the ultimate care and support for your back and overall posture. There's no transfer of movement between you and your partner either. The Somni is a medium-feel mattress - which means it's not too soft or too firm. 
Somni-encapsulated technology helps reinforce the mattress border. That means you'll get a sturdier mattress edge and plenty of space to spread out in bed - with no worries about rolling off! All you will need to do to keep it in good condition is rotate it once a month.


BED KEY FEATURES:

  • Divan Bed with Somni Pocket Gel Hybrid Mattress
  • Matching Headboard
  • Chenille Fabric 
  • Color option
  • Drawers Option
  • Handcrafted in the UK
  • Assembly Required
MATTRESS SPECIFICATIONS:
  • High-density foam base
  • Gel transition foam and memory foam
  • Pocket Spring System
  • The stretch-knit fabric cover
  • Tape-edge finish
  • The cover is not removable
  • Medium-firm comfort
  • Somni encapsulated technology
  • The sculpted AirFlow layer maintains coolness
  • 10 inches thick roll packed
  • Available in 5 sizes
  • UK Fire Retardant 
  • Spot clean only
  • 3-year Limited Manufacturer warranty

Mattress Dimensions:


3ft Single - 90 x 190 cm
4ft Small Double - 122 x 190 cm
4ft6 Double - 137 x 190 cm
5ft King Size - 152 x 200 cm

beds.Name: Parklane Luxury Bed Plush Velvet with Headboard Silver
beds.Body:
No matter what bedroom ideas you may have, this stunning Parklane Silver Plush Bed effortlessly fits into that plan. The bed offers broad appeal to the home and takes bedroom furniture to a new level. Its clever tufted headboard shines with plush velvet upholstery that’s both comfortable and attractive. Upholstered with Chesterfield deep button upholstery all around, including the footboard and side rails, the Parklane Silver Plush bed features sleek style and grid tufting for an inviting look that complements a variety of home decor.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Premium Plush Velvet
  • Headboard
  • Sprung-Slatted Base for Longer Mattress Life
  • Wooden Frame
  • Assembly Required

 
DIMENSIONS:


4 FT6 DOUBLE

  • Length: 200 cm
  • Width: 157 cm
  • Height: 87 cm
5 FT KING
  • Length: 200 cm
  • Width: 168 cm
  • Height: 87 cm

beds.Name: Birlea Sophia Metal Bed 3ft Single Pink
beds.Body:
The Birlea Sophia Pink Metal bed uses a heart motif paired with curved and straight metalwork to provide an elegant, lithe centerpiece for your child's bedroom. Framed on both sides by thin posts with classic bed knobs, the bed's headboard and footboard boast a curved band with curled accents. This sense of natural design pairs with the strength of the metal. The base of this Birlea Sophia Pink Metal frame is sprung slatted to provide any style of mattress with fantastic support. Extra storage space under the platform bed can store trivial things, toys, etc., which is easy to clean.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Adorable design with hearth embellishments 
  • Curved Head End and Foot End
  • Pink Painted Metal 
  • The maximum weight load for this is 100 kg
  • Assembly Required

beds.Name: Sleep Plus Hybrid Mattress + Divan Bed with Headboard - more color options
beds.Body:
We present Our Divan bed with Sleep Plus Hybrid Mattress inspired by the classic style of the vintage furniture from a London apartment, with a frame and a chic headboard. Chenille upholstered panels of the storage bed. Two drawers on each side offer convenient storage for linens and essentials.
From Sleep Plus Gel Hybrid Mattress, this 8-inch provides five layers of support for a luxuriously comfortable sleeping experience. The gel memory foam mattress keeps you cool as you sleep. It conforms to the shape of your body to offer pressure point relief. This Divan bed with a Sleep Plus mattress provides a satisfying sleeping experience. That is why the mattress never needs turning. The Sleep Plus Gel Hybrid Mattress feature is a gel-infused memory foam layer that facilitates heat dissipation and helps regulate sleeping temperature. The ortho spring system shape provides effective support while enhancing air circulation. So, it is very comfortable to sleep. Besides, the material selected is flame-retardant and safe to use.


BED KEY FEATURES:

  • Divan Bed with Sleep Plus Hybrid Mattress
  • Matching Headboard
  • Chenille Fabric 
  • Color option
  • Drawers Option
  • Handcrafted in the UK
  • Assembly Required

  • Gel transition foam and memory foam

corner-sofas.Name: Sloane Luxury Large Double Corner Sofa Plush Velvet
corner-sofas.Body:
From The Sloane collection, Large Corner Sofa invites guests to unwind in casual refinement. Genuine back cushions are covered in premium plush velvet upholstery to provide cozy support. A strong hardwood frame grants peace of mind for its durability and strength. Where classic style meets modern functionality – the Sloane Large Corner Sofa features beautiful details that set the stage for this timeless design. Featuring an oversized corner, each piece is upholstered in soft yet durable luxury plush. Bring the brilliance of time-honored style with modern functionality into the center of your home with the Sloane Luxury Grey Sofa. Made in the UK, the grey, silver, and mink hue and contemporary track arm silhouette give this stylish corner a laid-back sophistication.

corner-sofas.Name: Portland Luxury Large Corner Sofa Grey
corner-sofas.Body:
Add a striking architectural accent to your living space with our clean-lined Portland Collection. Styled with thin, square arms for a modern look, the sectional's pared-down profile plays counterpoint to Kensington fabric and down-blend cushions for indulgent lounging. The Portland Large Corner Grey is master crafted in Britain from British and imported materials. A perfect pick for classic comfort, our versatile Portland Large Corner Grey Sofa is now available with cosy seating that accommodates the whole family. Its simple, inviting silhouette suits a wide variety of styles and room settings. It's available in timelessly chic Cream and Grey fabric, so you can make it all your own. The Footstool is available too. 


KEY FEATURES:

  • Luxury Kensington Fabric
  • Removable/Washable Back Cushion Covers

Whether your aesthetic is urban hip or suburban chic, this posh sofa with two footstools is sure to look and feel right at home. Wrapped in chunky heavyweight chenille fabric with a delightful touch, this fashion-forward U Shape Charcoal Grey Sofal includes designer full-back cushions for a brilliant pop of color, texture, and rest.

corner-sofas.Name: Sloane Luxury Sofa 4 Seater Left Hand Corner
corner-sofas.Body:
From The Sloane collection, Sloane Left Hand Corner Sofa invites guests to unwind in casual refinement. Genuine back cushions are covered in premium plush velvet upholstery to provide cozy support. A strong hardwood frame grants peace of mind for its durability and strength. Where classic style meets modern functionality – the Sloane Corner Sofa features beautiful details that set the stage for this timeless design. Each piece is upholstered in soft yet durable luxury plush. Bring the brilliance of time-honored style merged with modern, functional right into the center of your home with the Sloane Left Hand Corner Sofa. Made in the UK, the silver hue and contemporary track arm silhouette give this stylish corner a laid-back sophistication.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Premium Plush Velvet
  • Thick Luxury Foam Sprung 
  • Quality Foam Fillings
  • Strong Wooden Frame
  • Chrome Feet
  • Assembly Required

corner-sofas.Body:
Cuddle up in the soft comfort of the Bentley Full Back Grey sofa. The generous size, square arms, and density foam that adapts to the contours of your body invite many hours of naps, socializing, and relaxation. If you love the idea of indulgently comfortable furniture with a casually cool sense of flair this 8-seater Bentley Full Back Grey sofa is custom-made with you in mind. Oversized scale and feel-good luxury chenille upholstery make it all too easy to kick back and relax. Ultra neutral fabric and clean flowing profile are plenty stylish without overwhelming your space.

corner-sofas.Name: Vegas Modular Corner Sofa Full Back Grey
corner-sofas.Body:
Do you know the feeling when you like to sit, lie down, or hang out on a sofa? That’s how embracing the deep and generous Vegas Modular Corner Grey Sofa is your new favorite place for cozy evenings and lazy days! The Vegas will let you relax in your updated living space's stunning yet straightforward aesthetics. The Vegas Modular Corner is upholstered in a soft fabric and features a balance of casual style and comfort. The chic rounded track arms enhance the graceful yet subtle appeal, while the seat cushions add a freshly tailored look. The expertly crafted wooden frame offers durability for many years of enjoyment. This collection comes with full-back cushions.

mattresses.Name: Royal Gel Memory Hybrid Mattress 30cm Depth
mattresses.Body:
Sleep better at night with this Royal Gel Memory 30-cm mattress. The mattress minimizes motion transfer and relieves pressure points with its layered construction. The gel foam top helps moderate the temperature for sleep without sweating all night long. A high-density foundation layer provides stable support for the whole mattress. The benefits are the better distribution of body weight from head to toe. That can minimize tossing and turning thanks to gel memory foam. We can also safely say that sleeping partners are rarely awakened by one another because of foam that isolates motion between sleepers. Royal Gel Memory Mattress can improve your sleeping quality and raise your standard of living.


SPECIFICATIONS:

  • High-density foam base
  • Gel transition foam and memory foam
  • Ortho Spring System
  • The stretch-knit damask fabric cover
  • Tape-edge finish
  • The cover is not removable
  • Medium-firm comfort
  • Gel memory foam adjusts to your body
  • The sculpted AirFlow layer maintains coolness
  • 12 inches thick roll packed
  • Available in 4 sizes
  • UK Fire Retardant 
  • Spot clean only
  • 3-year Limited Manufacturer warranty 

Mattress Dimensions:


3ft Single - 90 x 190 cm
4ft Small Double - 122 x 190 cm
4ft6 Double - 137 x 190 cm
5ft King Size - 152 x 200 cm
6ft Super King Size - 180 x 200 cm

mattresses.Name: Somni Cool Gel Foam Hybrid Mattress 2500 Pocket Spring Medium Firm
mattresses.Body:
Why you can rest easy with Somni? We are experts in the science of sleep, and over a million customers have already trusted us to give them the best night's sleep they've ever had. Somni Cool Gel Memory 2500 Pocket Sprung Mattress is a gel-infused memory foam technology. That helps give this mattress a truly cooling feel. The 5cm gel-memory layer helps dissipate excess body heat. The result is you fall asleep faster! Nestled underneath the cooling gel memory, you'll find thousands of individual pocket springs, working to provide the support you need. Pocket springs give the ultimate care and support for your back and overall posture. There's no transfer of movement between you and your partner either. The Somni Cool Gel Memory 2500 is a medium-feel mattress - which means it's not too soft or too firm. 
Somni-encapsulated technology helps reinforce the mattress border. That means you'll get a sturdier mattress edge and plenty of space to spread out in bed - with no worries about rolling off! All you will need to do to keep it in good condition is rotate it once a month.


SPECIFICATIONS:

  • High-density foam base
  • Gel transition foam and memory foam
  • Pocket Spring System
  • The stretch-knit fabric cover
  • Tape-edge finish
  • The Cover is Removable and Washable
  • Medium-firm comfort
  • Somni encapsulated technology
  • The sculpted AirFlow layer maintains coolness
  • 10 inches thick roll packed
  • Available in 5 sizes
  • UK Fire Retardant 
  • Spot clean only
  • 3-year Limited Manufacturer warranty

Mattress Dimensions:

mattresses.Name: Sleep Plus Gel Hybrid Mattress 8 Inches
mattresses.Body:
From Sleep Plus Gel Hybrid Mattress, this 8-inch provides five layers of support for a luxuriously comfortable sleeping experience. The gel memory foam mattress keeps you cool as you sleep. It conforms to the shape of your body to offer pressure point relief. This provides a satisfying sleeping experience. That is why the mattress never needs turning. The Sleep Plus Gel Hybrid Mattress feature is a gel-infused memory foam layer that facilitates heat dissipation and helps regulate sleeping temperature. The ortho spring system shape provides effective support while enhancing air circulation. So, it is very comfortable to sleep. Besides, the material selected is flame-retardant and safe to use.

With a long history of quality construction and a terrific warranty to back it up, the Cashmere Latex Pocket mattress can change your life today.

mattresses.Name: Sleep Cool Gel Memory Foam Mattress Pocket Spring
mattresses.Body:
Get the best night's sleep with this Sleep Pocket Spring gel memory foam mattress. It features the most advanced materials to ensure your comfort and rest, including a quilted top, a layer of gel memory foam, gel transition foam, and a high-density foam base for support. This hybrid mattress has a gel-infused memory foam layer and a supportive PU foam layer. It offers optimal body temperature and reliable support for all sleepers. The Sleep Pocket Spring mattress helps distribute the weight and relieve pressure on your neck, shoulder, and waist. The memory foam provides air circulation and better conforms to your body curve.

mattresses.Body:
This Memory touch mattress from Furniture Direct Online offers a premier combination of support and comfort. The independently-encased Bonnel spring foundation is topped with a layer of memory foam that conforms to your body. The breathable knitted fabric from one side of the cover and Belgian Damask tufted fabric help keep you cool all night.
The memory foam can relieve pressure points across the body. That improves blood circulation and provides much better sleep. Truly a premium Memory touch mattress, you will love its supportive comfort and hypoallergenic design.

mattresses.Name: Majesty Pocket Gel Mattress Medium Firm
mattresses.Body:
Natural aloe vera infused into the cover of the Pocket Gel Mattress lends hypoallergenic and antimicrobial particles which resist dust mites for years of restful sleep. Temperature-smart memory foam keeps you cool as you slumber, ensuring a refreshing and restorative night's rest. Make this Pocket Gel mattress a part of your commitment to health and well-being. Sleep on a comfy cooling top that's gentle on your skin and lets you sink in. A firm base layer gives support keeping you from sinking in too far. The perfect mattress is a mixture of both hard and soft.


Mattress Specification:

  • High-density foam base
  • Gel transition foam 
  • Foam Encapsulated Pocket Springs
  • Fabric Cover with Natural Aloe Vera 
  • Tape-edge finish

With a comfortable layer of latex on top of individually-wrapped coils, there is no motion transfer between partners and a whole night's restorative sleep experience. The Silk Latex mattress with natural latex foam, silk fabric, and encapsulated pocket spring construction, makes it ideal for the sensitive and discerning consumer. This mattress impedes fungal growth for long sanitary. The firm support ensures you get the good night's sleep you need and deserve.

mattresses.Name: Excellency Double Side Mattress Pocket Spring Firm
mattresses.Body:
Crafted with attention to detail, the Double Side Mattress features five layers of premium materials designed for your comfort. It all starts with a top layer of orthopaedic memory foam that contours to your body's curves while helping to release body pressure because that helps align your back, hips, and shoulders. Next, Aloe Vera, infused in a cover is known to promote a clean environment. Pocket Spring System is ideal for side, back, or stomach sleepers. Truly a premium Double Side mattress, you will love its supportive comfort and hypoallergenic design.

  • Orthopaedic High-density foam
  • Luxurious Filling
  • Foam Encapsulated Pocket Spring

  • Natural Aloe Vera in Cover

Above all, it features individually wrapped pocket springs that provide pressure-relieving support and reduced motion transfer for uninterrupted sleep. The CoolMax soft knitted comfort cover provides additional comfort and a dry environment during sleep. Recharge your body with this uniquely designed Memory Comfort mattress because it will meet your "dream" goal of comfort & quality.

  • Pocket Spring System

Do you know the feeling when you like to sit, lie down, or hang out on a sofa? That’s how embracing the deep, generous Verona Sofa Set is – your new favorite place for cozy evenings and lazy days! The Verona Sofa will enable you to relax in the stunning yet straightforward aesthetics of your updated living space. The 3+2-set is upholstered in a soft fabric and features a balance of casual style and comfort. The chic rounded track arms enhance the graceful yet subtle appeal, while the seat cushions add a freshly tailored look. The expertly crafted wooden frame offers durability for many years of enjoyment. This Verona Sofa Set 3+2 collection comes with scatter-back cushions.

  • Luxury Soft Fabric

best-sellers.Body:
From The Sloane collection, Large Corner Sofa invites guests to unwind in casual refinement. Genuine back cushions are covered in premium plush velvet upholstery to provide cozy support. A strong hardwood frame grants peace of mind for its durability and strength. Where classic style meets modern functionality – the Sloane Large Corner Sofa features beautiful details that set the stage for this timeless design. Featuring an oversized corner, each piece is upholstered in soft yet durable luxury plush. Bring the brilliance of time-honored style with modern functionality into the center of your home with the Sloane Luxury Grey Sofa. Made in the UK, the grey, silver, and mink hue and contemporary track arm silhouette give this stylish corner a laid-back sophistication.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Premium Plush Velvet
  • Thick Luxury Foam Sprung 
  • Quality Foam Fillings
  • Strong Wooden Frame
  • Chrome Feet
  • Assembly Required
DIMENSIONS APPROXIMATE:
  • Width: 265 cm
  • Length: 265 cm
  • Height: 97 cm
  • Overall Height: 89 cm
  • Floor to Top of The Seat 45 cm
  • Seat Depth: 76 cm
  • Arm Width: 27 cm

best-sellers.Collection: Some of our best selling sofas
best-sellers.Name: Sorrento Recliner 3+2 Sofa Set Fabric Grey
best-sellers.Body:
The Sorrento recliner 3+2 sofa set is the top of comfort with its laid-back cushions and power reclining capabilities. You will feel like you are on a getaway every time you take time to enjoy the Sorrento set. Regal, luxurious and stately, the Sorrento Reclining Sofa set can add a classy and formal appeal to any sitting room or formal living room. This handsome reclining set comfortably accommodates five people on its three and two-cushion seat design. With this sofa, you will not only receive a reclining sofa. A standard reclining chair is for double relaxation power. The Sorrento recliner 3+2 furniture is upholstered in chenille fabric.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Soft Luxury Chenille Fabric
  • High-Density Foam
  • Pull Down Cupholders 
  • Strong Hardwood Frame
  • Assembly Required

DIMENSIONS:


3 SEATER: Width: 190 cm; Length: 90 cm; Height: 90 cm Seat Depth: 60 cm; 
2 SEATER: Width: 170 cm; Length: 90 cm; Height: 90 cm; Seat Depth: 60 cm;

u-shape-sofas.Body:
When you look at the Bishop U shape truffle sofa, you will know it has been made for you. The huge corner sofa is constructed from the best materials to ensure a sturdy sofa that will last for years to come. From its broad, cushioned seats to its luxury chenille upholstery, that is the definition of luxe. At the same time, its removable footstools allow you to transform into the right or the left corner sofa. We have chosen this Bishop U shape sofa for your family because of its superb build quality, adjustable design with moveable footstools that can be reconfigured as you like, and unbeatable price. That looks amazing as a centerpiece for any living room.

u-shape-sofas.Code: Bentley U Shape Full Back Grey
u-shape-sofas.Name: Bentley Large U Shape Sofa Full Back Grey
u-shape-sofas.Body:
Cuddle up in the soft comfort of the Bentley Full Back Grey sofa. The generous size, square arms, and density foam that adapts to the contours of your body invite many hours of naps, socializing, and relaxation. If you love the idea of indulgently comfortable furniture with a casually cool sense of flair this 8-seater Bentley Full Back Grey sofa is custom-made with you in mind. Oversized scale and feel-good luxury chenille upholstery make it all too easy to kick back and relax. Ultra neutral fabric and clean flowing profile are plenty stylish without overwhelming your space.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Luxury Chenille Fabric
  • Full Back Cushions
  • All Covers are Removable and Washable
  • Medium Density Foam
  • Chrome Feet
  • Assembly Required

wardrobes.Code: Devonshire Sliding Three Door Wardrobe White with Mirror
wardrobes.Name: Devonshire Sliding Three Door Wardrobe White with Mirror
wardrobes.Body:
With its minimal design and soft-toned, natural hues, the Devonshire Three Door White Sliding Wardrobe will work beautifully with any style of interior décor. The wardrobe interior is made up of three hanging spaces and three shelf spaces. It provides plenty of room to store your clothes and accessories. Not only practical, but the large central mirror also works to make the room feel brighter. Wardrobe storage capacity is arranged into shelves and hanging space. Devonshire Three-Door White Sliding wardrobes are available in three different colors to suit all tastes!

wardrobes.Code: Devonshire Two Door Wardrobe with Drawer Oak
wardrobes.Name: Devonshire Two Door Wardrobe with Drawer Oak
wardrobes.Body:
This Devonshire Two Door Oak Wardrobe with Drawer is our contemporary take on a classic French design. The wardrobe stands on a softly stepped base and features an eye-catching moulded crown with classically flared cornices. Both beautifully panelled doors open to reveal heaps of hanging space for your clothes. For even more storage options there is a generously-sized drawer at the base of the unit. The Devonshire Two Door Oak Wardrobe stands with exceptional strength and durability.   In keeping with the refined styling, both the drawer and the cupboard doors are finished with modern styled handles.
 
KEY FEATURES:
  • Two Door
  • Integrated Drawer
  • Hanging Rod to Store Clothes
  • Rectangular Design
  • Curved Top Edges
  • Manufactured in the UK
  • Assembly Required
 
 
DIMENSIONS:
  • Width: 79,7 cm
  • Height: 181,5 cm
  • Depth: 56 cm

wardrobes.Code: Devonshire Dressing Table Set White
wardrobes.Name: Devonshire Dressing Table Set White
wardrobes.Body:
A Devonshire White Dressing Table Set is a great addition to any bedroom that has the space for it. It is a place to get ready and start your day. This stylish example features a wooden top and brass accents. Finished in an oak colorway with a contrasting beveled edge oak-effect top and brushed round cup handles. The Devonshire White Dressing Table Set has a design that would suit any bedroom. This gorgeous self-assembly dressing table offers plenty of storage space and comes with an angled mirror and a matching cushioned stool that tucks neatly away when not in use.


KEY FEATURES:

  • Dressing Table with Three Drawers
  • One stool and one mirror
  • Strong and Durable Particle Board
  • Rectangular Design
